title: Colonizing Mars - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/27/18
itunes:title: Colonizing Mars - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/27/18
description:
George Noory and Astronomy professor David Weintraub explore the steps that will be needed to start human colonies on Mars, as soon as the next decade.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
